text.section: In each appeal, the Tax Court shall issue a written order that sets forth its decision.
Each order of the Tax Court shall be filed with its clerk.

The clerk of the Tax Court shall certify the order in an appeal and mail a copy of the certified order to:
each party to the appeal; and
the tax determining agency from which the appeal is taken.
